blocks.text: I know I am slow, sorry about that, there are some real life complications. I will continue work on it when I get the chance. There is good news though, the Vuplex browser now routs audio through Unity so there is Unity audio components available like echo and stuff. I have implemented a better menu and UI.

If the quit menu is not working, it's not a hack its just a underlying bug. You will have to use task manager (Alt F4 might work on it) to close it if that happens. The music may continue to play for a min (seems to auto close after a min or so) after that or until you close the Vuplex task manager process (this is the built in browser). I am trying to figure out a fix.

Update: I have the fix and fix for the overnight bug listed in the readme also. I am going through a rewrite, should be out in a few days.

Update two: I put up a fixed version. Changing hotkeys broke for now. There is static global hotkeys. Play/Pause is Alt, Shift, F10. Next Song is Alt, Shift, F11. Previous Song is Alt, Shift, F12.
Fixed a bug with the second browser window not stopping its videos when top right clicked.
Small update with a fix for when the window changes size from some outside code. Same download link.
